info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 8:11PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Moderate to Heavy snowfall will impact portions of east central Luna and west central Dona Ana Counties through 930 PM MST... At 809 PM MST, NWS Meteorologists were tracking a band of moderate to heavy snowfall impacting Interstate 10 from Deming to Las Cruces. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snowfall and winds in excess of 45 mph reducing visibility to 0.5 to 2 SM. SOURCE...Satellite, surface observations, and web cameras. IMPACT...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility overnight. Locations impacted include... Deming and Akela. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 82 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
